name: Mostly Compost
description:
A renegade comet has crashed into the Food and Feather Factory. Gather the falling compostables and grow your ultimate garden!

I made Mostly Compost as a birthday present for my lovely partner (the star of the game). It celebrates her and her passion around all things related to composting and gardening!

GAMEPLAY
Mostly Compost is a Kaboom-inspired, arcade style item collection game. Collect compostable items as you run back and forth across the screen. Grow the ultimate garden by gathering enough compost! Grab power-ups and avoid falling enemies. Mostly Compost contains both a story mode (with 5 unique levels) and an endless high score mode.

CONTROLS
hold down space/click and hold/tap and hold: RUN
